itemLabel: Garfield Davies, Baron Davies of Coity

wikipedia_page.main: David Garfield Davies, Baron  Davies of Coity,  (24 June 1935 – 4 March 2019 ) was a Labour Co-operative peer in the House of Lords and a former trade union leader.
